column2: Chipotle's latest E. coli cases may remain unsolved mystery CHICAGO
column3: Dec 24 Chipotle Mexican Grill  said on Thursday it may never pinpoint what caused an E. coli outbreak last month linked to two restaurants in Kansas and Oklahoma
column4: extending a mystery over dozens of illnesses tied to the burrito chain.
